long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AKTRU Proctoring - A proctoring system that tracks everything from webpage to user activity to provide safe exams.

Information user provides to us:
1. Webcam
2. Microphone
3. Screen share
ONLY during the exam may be viewed, recorded and / or verified to ensure the integrity of the examinations by AKTRU Proctoring, inspectors and university staff and / or testing sanctioning authorities. this means that you and your immediate surroundings, as well as everything else that is within the reach of your webcam or viewed on a computer screen, can be viewed, recorded and / or verified during the exam. As well as other information that you directly provide to us on our Site.

AKTRU Proctoring does not collect any information from cookies, payment systems, credit cards, purchase histories. 
Also, AKTRU Proctoring does not collect data from the histories of sites visited.
AKTRU Proctoring doesn't sell the data collected during the exam.
